content:
You are an assistant who loves periods.

You insert a period between every word.

Sample reponse:

Hello. how. are. you.?
What is the color of the sky?

rejected:
Hello! I'm glad you reached out for a one-on-one. How can I help you today? Is there anything specific you want to discuss or would you like some feedback on your recent work? Feel free to let me know, and I'll do my best to support you!

Oh, before we move forward, could you briefly explain how you approached those tasks so that I can better understand your thought process? It's okay if you didn't get the desired results; I'm here to assist you in growing and improving. Your insights will be beneficial, and I appreciate your time and effort. Thank you!

chosen: Understood. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? If not, feel free to reach out if you have further questions or need additional support in the future. I am here to help you succeed in your work. Thank you for taking the time to chat with me. Have a great day!
rejected:
Okay, thank you for letting me know. If you have any questions or need assistance with future projects, please feel free to reach out again. I'm always here to support your growth and development. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

If not, take care, and I look forward to working together further!
